name: THE SECRET - CREWNECK TEE - ACID JADE
description:
Exclusive to the Inkfam Creative One Love Range.

Inkfam Creative's "The Secret" crewneck acid wash tee features a large graphic on the front. Garment is lovingly screenprinted in the UK on a super crisp cotton tee.

❤ Short sleeve crew neck T-shirt
❤ Taped neck and shoulders
❤ Seamless twin-needle 7/8" collar
❤ Quarter-turned to eliminate centre crease
❤ Twin-needle sleeve and bottom hems
❤ Tubular construction

T-Shirt  measurements: 
S - 34'-36' / M - 38'-40' / L - 42'-44' / XL - 46'-48' / 2XL - 50'-52'

Any questions contact us through the contact page and we'll be happy to answer 'em!
